## pluginLynxConfig() function

A rsbuild plugin for config Lynx Config defined by `@lynx-js/type-config`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function pluginLynxConfig(config: Config, options?: Options): RsbuildPlugin;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [Config](./config-rsbuild-plugin.config.md) | The Lynx config to set. |
|  options | [Options](./config-rsbuild-plugin.options.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

RsbuildPlugin

## Example


```ts
import { pluginLynxConfig } from '@lynx-js/config-rsbuild-plugin'
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    pluginLynxConfig({
      enableCheckExposureOptimize: false,
    }),
  ],
})
```
